snippet.title: Paralives - Paramaker Overview
snippet.description:
Discover the high level of customization offered by Paralives’ Paramaker! Meet Marvin and Eli!
✅ Wishlist Paralives on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1118520/Paralives/ 

Key features in this video:
◭ Equip any outfit regardless of the Parafolk’s gender 
◭ All of the skin tones!
◭ Freehand tattoo placement and scaling 
◭ Mole placement and scaling
◭ Realistic fat and muscle sliders
◭ Changeable patterns for some clothes
◭ Improved height slider
◭ Adam's apple adjustment
◭ Heterochromia
◭ Various facial and body hair for Parafolks of any gender

🎁 Support the development on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/alexmasse 
This game is entirely funded by the community. A monthly pledge of 3$ helps us recruit more people on the team and unlocks cool rewards for you!

🗣️ Join the Discord community to share ideas: http://discord.gg/paralives 

#Paralives #LifeSim
